titleStmt.title: Oates new shams discovered: and how they carried it on from time to time sent in a letter to his Grace James Duke of Monmouth from Doctor Titus Oates.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Absalon Chamberlain, in Red-bull play-house-yard over against the Pound in St. John-street; near Clerken-well-green,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Red-bull play-house-yard over against the Pound in St. John-street; near Clerken-well-green
